item.description:
OPEN MIC, Live Music, Networking

OPEN MIC. Party with Free Live Music in Union Square. Great venue, talented musicians and an open mike. Here is the ad -

Attention Party goers, Musicians, & Singers!! Come join the party at the Mon Night Open mike! Everyone Welcome. No cover charge - Play music solo or with backing band. All instruments and styles welcome. Originals, covers, blues, jazz, classic rock, R&B, Motown, folk, etc. Back up band with drums, bass, guitar, and Songlist for singers.

This is a great opportunity to further your music experience and career, jam with other musicians, play solo, play originals, and network. The goal is to have everyone play as much as possible. Even if you don't plan to play, come to check this out, and meet some nice people. This is a combined meetup of 4 music groups and sometimes 1, 2 or more other social groups.

Boston Music Jam:  

If you can bring song sheets for your songs on one page that will facilitate playing. If you want to be play with accompanying bass /lead/harmony try to come early at 7:30PM and bring about 4 copies of 2 or 3 songs you want to play on 1 sheet per song if possible, so we can all play it. If you are playing at semi-professional level and are playing solo or don't need to rehearse, just come to the open mike.

group.name: The NEW England Singer Songwriter Musician Guild

item.name: OPEN MIC - Live Music Party, Networking!
